game.description: Explore the ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary Sword of Light.
game.objective: Retrieve the Sword of Light to save the kingdom from darkness.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting increased strength and agility

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous jungle and find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
tasks.objective: Reach the entrance without triggering any traps or encountering hostile creatures.

tasks.description: Solve the puzzles inside the ancient temple to unlock the door to the sword chamber.
tasks.objective: Unlock the door within 30 minutes without using any outside resources.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian of the Sword of Light in combat.
tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian without taking any damage from its attacks.

game.title: Retrieving the Sword of Light
